      • load

        public ResourceConfigSeq load​(InputStream inputStream,
                              String baseURI,
                              ClassLoader classLoader)
        Digest the XML Smooks configuration stream.
        Specified by:
        load in interface ResourceConfigLoader
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The stream.
        baseURI - The base URI to be associated with the configuration stream.
        Returns:
        A ResourceConfigSeq containing the list of ResourceConfigs defined in the XML configuration.
        Throws:
        SAXException - Error parsing the XML stream.
        IOException - Error reading the XML stream.
        SmooksConfigException - Invalid configuration..
